user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable and supportive undergarments suitable for an active lifestyle.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable undergarment that could support my active lifestyle. The product's description highlighted its soft cotton fabric and front close design, which appealed to my need for comfort. However, my experience revealed that it did not provide the support I expected, leading to disappointment despite its comfort.

I needed a sports bra that offered both comfort and support for my workouts. The detailed features, such as seamless inners to reduce friction and the ability to wear it as an outer garment, were significant factors in my decision. The positive reviews and high rating also influenced my choice, confirming that it met my requirements.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer comfortable, stylish clothing that fits well and enhances my appearance without being overly tight or restrictive. I value high-quality materials that provide a good stretch and flexibility, as well as designs that are versatile enough for various occasions, from casual to more formal settings. I appreciate items that are easy to care for and maintain their shape after washing. Additionally, I tend to favor products that offer a flattering fit, especially those that help conceal imperfections. On the other hand, I dislike items that do not fit as expected, particularly when sizing is inconsistent, and I am not fond of products that make me feel uncomfortable or self-conscious about my appearance. Overall, I seek a balance of comfort, style, and quality in my purchases.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and supportive undergarments suitable for an active lifestyle. within my expected price range: [10.25, 37.89]
What specific types of undergarments are you looking for, such as bras, sports bras, underwear, or others?
I'm looking for supportive sports bras that offer both comfort and functionality for my active lifestyle.
What level of impact support are you looking for in your sports bras?
I'm looking for supportive sports bras that offer both comfort and functionality for my active lifestyle.
What specific features do you prioritize in sports bras for your active lifestyle, such as moisture-wicking fabric, adjustable straps, or high-impact support?
I prioritize features like moisture-wicking fabric, adjustable straps, and high-impact support in sports bras for my active lifestyle.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Champion Women's Sports Bra, Spot Comfort, Maximum Support, High-Impact Sports Bra for Women> / Item ID: B0BH1ZBZ4N / Price: $28.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["SPOT ON COMFORT. The Spot Comfort® Full Support Sports Bra with maximum support is wire-free and has molded cups that provide natural shaping and superb support for high-impact activities. Mesh neckline, front inset panel, and straps offer strategic ventilation where you need it most. This high-impact sports bra is made with Double Dry™ technology to wick away moisture. Comfort is enhanced further by the smooth lining and bottom band that feel great against your skin. Soft gel-infused straps are designed to take the pressure off your shoulders, and reduce dig in. You'll also appreciate the U-back design with set-in straps and cushioned hook-and-eye closure. There's lots to love about this bestselling, high-impact sport bra."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <SYROKAN Women's Sports Bra Wireless Comfort High Impact Support Bounce Control Plus Size Workout Bra> / Item ID: B08L84PDW1 / Price: $20.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Get maximum support for the highest-impact activities in a highly  structured sports bra built from advanced moisture-wicking fabric  that keeps you cool, dry and comfortable.  The two-part cups and side support work to ensure minimal movement and bounce. The firm fabric and carefully seamed cups provide the bust with strong  support and the back panels allow moisture to evaporate away from the skin. This bra is for activities including running, cross training, or other high impact activities.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Champion Women's Sports Bra, Absolute, Maximum Support, High-Impact Sports Bra for Women> / Item ID: B0BJ7MTPBP / Price: $19.86 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['ABSOLUTE COMFORT. This racerback style offers all the support you need with snug compression fabric and features a SmoothTec® band that reduces chafing to promote all-day comfort. Double Dry™ technology wicks away moisture from the skin to keep you cool and dry, while the T-shaped back lets your skin breathe and allows for a greater range of motion. This sleek performance sports bra comes in tons of colors to match your everyday style. Pair it with your best Champion leggings for a workout fit all your own.']
